channel.title: Notepad ++
channel.description: Okay, with my F2P source I'm coding, I've received 100 errors, implying that I've missed out a brace, or added one too many, is there anyway I can use Notepad ++ to help my identify the area I need to add/remove a brace?

item.title: Notepad ++
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:12, topic:341980”][quote author=The Unholy link=topic=438391.msg3221890#msg3221890 date=1275247903]

or he can l2readerrorsinthecompiler

Or You Can L2stopbeingafag.

When you receive 100 errors, it doesn’t give you the area where you’ve missed out the brace. In the compiler.
[/quote]
The compiler printout usually tells you the exact line in the exact file of the error.[/quote]

I found his missing bracket 1300 lines above the compiler errors =p

Read full topic
